settings.title: Pick Your SOck subscription
settings.text:
Gift it or grab a sub for yourself.
You can’t go wrong either way.

settings.title: Customize your preferences
settings.text:
Pick your sock size, sub length and
checkout. Leave the rest to us!

settings.title: Unwrap Awesome Socks Every Month
settings.text:
Kick back and watch your #sockgame
transform from dull to dashing.

settings.title: Feed Your Addiction.
settings.text: Sock Fancy provides stylish folks like yourself with a monthly sock subscription to a selection of unique, eye-catching socks. For just 11 bucks a month you not only get a pair of awesome socks delivered to your door, but all the comfort and cool that fresh socks can bring.

settings.title: Subscribe and Save
settings.text: Sign up for a sock subscription and never run out of awesome socks again. Get socks delivered right to your doorstep every month.
